Serialized Form

Package gnu.cajo.invoke

Class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client implements Serializable

Class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

item

java.lang.Object item

itemClass

java.lang.Class itemClass

Package gnu.cajo.utils

Class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

mob

java.rmi.MarshalledObject mob
A reference to the proxy served by this item. It is assigned by the ProxyServer during its bind operation.

thread

java.lang.Thread thread
A reference to the item's processing thread. It is started automatically on construction. It can be interrupted, to signal the item for an orderly shutdown.

Class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

server

RemoteInvoke server
The reference to the sending server, on which the proxy may asynchronously callback. It is set by the ProxyServer during the bind operation.

bundle

java.lang.String bundle
The path & file name of the resource bundle in the proxy's jar file. It will be used to localize any displayed strings to the language of the proxy recipient, as necessary, and when supplied. It is public since its value is typically assigned by a builder program.

strings

java.lang.String[] strings
The collection of strings to be displayed at the host VM. On instantiation at the host, the array will be loaded with localized strings from the most appropriate resource bundle for the locale of the receiving VM, as necessary. It is public since its value is typically assigned by a builder program.

Class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

item

Invoke item

ps

java.io.PrintStream ps

Class gnu.cajo.utils.PanelProxy implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

server

RemoteInvoke server
The reference to the sending server, on which the proxy may asynchronously callback. It is set by the ProxyServer during the bind operation.

bundle

java.lang.String bundle
The path & file name of the resource bundle in the proxy's jar file. It will be used to localize any displayed strings to the language of the proxy recipient, as necessary, and if supplied. It is public since its value is typically assigned by a builder program.

java.lang.String[] strings
The collection of strings to be displayed at the host VM. On instantiation at the host, the array will be loaded with localized strings from the most appropriate resource bundle for the locale of the receiving VM, as necessary. It is public since its value is typically assigned by a builder program.

Class gnu.cajo.utils.ProxyLoader implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

handle

java.lang.String handle

server

RemoteInvoke server

Class gnu.cajo.utils.ZippedProxy implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

payload

byte[] payload
The compressed serialized proxy object. It is created on server assignment by when binding at the hosting VM. This will save time and memory, especially if the same proxy is sent many times. It is nulled at the client, following proxy decompression, to allow the unneeded memory to be garbage collected.
